messages.content: Generate SCSS code for a web page layout with a header, sidebar, and main content area. The main content area should scroll independently from the rest of the page.
what's the html code to go with it?

``` In this example, we have a basic HTML structure with a header and main element. Inside the main element, we have two divs â€“ one for the sidebar and another for the main content. You can add your own content inside these divs to create your web page. Remember to link the SCSS file to your HTML file using the link tag in the head of your HTML file.
